attributes.action: Jayne Torvill & Christopher Dean for Honours List NOW
attributes.additional_details:
I want this Government to recommend Jayne Torvill & Christopher Dean for the Queens Birthday Honours List (or if too late, the New Years Honours List).

Lets face it, they are both National Treasures, and if they achieved their Gold Medals at the Olympics now, they would automatically be given an honour (Dame Kelly Holmes, Sir Chris Hoy, etc etc etc).

So let's honour them NOW.
